text: Sanctuary is a Canadian science-fiction-fantasy television series. The show originally started out as a no-cost eight-webisode series and later expanded into a television-based 13-episode season after Syfy decided to buy the rights to it. The show ran for 4 seasons before Syfy said that the show had been cancelled. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:2000s Canadian television series Category:2008 Canadian television series debuts Category:2011 Canadian television series endings Category:Fantasy television series Category:Science fiction television series
title: Sanctuary (TV series)
